content.question: According to the voice message, the caller and the recipient were originally planning to do which of the following together?

choices.label: Make a presentation at a conference
Attend a colleagueâ€™s presentation at a conference

content.answer: Make a presentation at a conference

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Interpret the meaning of a text.
